titleStmt.title: The last terrible tempestious windes and weather Truely relating many lamentable ship-wracks, with drowning of many people, on the coasts of England, Scotland, France and Ireland: with the Iles of Wight, Garsey & Iarsey. Shewing also, many great mis-fortunes, that haue lately hapned on land, by reason of the windes and rayne, in diuers places of this kingdome.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Edward Allde and John Beale] for Ios: Hunt and are to be sold by Iohn Wright,

notesStmt.note: Printers' names from STC. "Beale pr[inted]. only quire B".
Running title reads: The great tempest.
"These things heereafter following were related to me by certaine saylers and countrey people, since the first were printed ..", D1-2.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
